pages.text: It's often hard to keep track of everything going on in my spells. I have to keep mental track of all the iotas on the stack, and I find myself making mistakes.$(br2)Fortunately, if I hold a $(item)Scrying Lens/$ in my other hand, I will be able to simply $(italic)see/$ the iotas in my stack, a description appearing before my eyes. How convenient!
$(italic)You must learn... to see what you are looking at./$
